snippet.title: Darkblade Ascent Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
⚔️ Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2406370/Darkblade_Ascent/

Darkblade Ascent is a fast paced First-Person Melee Roguelike RPG with randomly generated weapons and upgrades, unlockable new classes and persistent leveling. Hack and slash your way through atmospheric dark fantasy locations, unique monsters and bosses.

#firstperson #roguelike #steam #pcgaming #pcgamer #darkfantasygame #rpg #darkbladeascent
